content:
My sincerest apologies!
To construct an Omni-Gallery that meets our practical requirements,
we'll need to devise the architectural solution ourselves.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Meanwhile, I'll continue collecting ecological samples,
And if you happen to discover any new organisms
while gathering materials, please bring them to me right away!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: If the Omni-Gallery can leverage the unique ecosystem of the "microverse bubbles," we could potentially construct a genuinely open ecological system unaffected by turbulent flows.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Money alone isn't enough - you can't build anything without materials and personnel...
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
That's correct!
The Omni-Gallery's construction materials require
broken wood, amber ore, and temporal components...
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Ah, my apologies...
Our world bubble doesn't have any <color=#8AAB4B>Amber Ore</color> or
<color=#8AAB4B>Ancient Timepiece Components</color>, we'll need to collect those from other world bubbles.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Unfortunately, I must point out...
Having just a "micro-world bubble" alone
won't allow us to achieve our goal in one step.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Hoho, your idea is interesting,
but "micro-world bubbles" don't exactly transform into houses,
and these ecological specimens can't be left to roam freely on them.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: I'm sorry for ignoring everyone!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
If you collect any of these materials,
you can bring them to me, regardless of quantity.
Every little bit counts! We'll eventually gather enough!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Leave it to me!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Therefore, please allow me to contribute!
I will personally cover all expenses
required for the gallery's construction!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Ah... I initially thought you were merely planning to conduct an Ecological Vitality Survey on the "Microworld Bubble," but to think you'd transform it into an Omni-Gallery.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
What?!
Are you saying that sufficient ecological samples and "micro-world bubbles" 
still don't constitute stable conditions for establishing an Omni-Gallery?
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Whether this situation might trigger a Maelstrom remains to be seen, but at the very least, please check with the neighbors before taking action.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
How about we empty out what's inside the "Mini-World Bubble"...
Mm-hmm, don't worry!
My scientific integrity would never allow me to act recklessly!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: But trust me, retrieving the "Small World Bubble" is the most efficient approach - it will minimize both research consumption and maintenance costs!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Hoho hoho...
Here's a <color=#8AAB4B>Lumia Bottle</color> 
specifically prepared for your travels. Please accept it.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
It's like a fish returning to water, or a tiger sprouting wings...
In essence, what I mean is, with the "Microverse Bubble,"
our Omni-Gallery will transcend from excellent to extraordinary!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Would it be acceptable if I just provide the funding?
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
I had already prepared some funds,
However, my planning wasn't thorough enough,
I failed to account for the fact that the Omni-Gallery is an actual building.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
However, in that case,
I won't have the capacity to assist with other matters...
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
I've calculated the quantities,
We need <color=#8AAB4B>6</color> <color=#8AAB4B>broken wood</color>,
<color=#8AAB4B>5</color> <color=#8AAB4B>amber ore</color>, and <color=#8AAB4B>3</color> <color=#8AAB4B>old timepiece parts</color>.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
As for the materials needed for the entire construction project,
I'll have to collect them from everyone.
I hope this won't cause too much trouble.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Go find <color=#8AAB4B>Esassani</color> now, and you'll be able to embark on your expedition to gather materials from other worlds.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
I need to have the same kind of determination as you
to complete all my research plans
after the Omni-Gallery!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: By establishing the <color=#8AAB4B>Omni-Gallery</color>, we'll be able to concentrate on researching and presenting the marvels of our Bubble World from multiple perspectives.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Wouldn't you consider
a solution that gets straight to the point?
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Although it's hardly worth mentioning,
I have previously participated in museum construction projects,
I could recommend the Loomi Co. engineering team, but...
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: A negligible quantity of materials, I assure you!
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Mr. Mobai just pointed out that
the "Small World Bubble" we brought back
cannot be directly converted into an Omni-Gallery, we need to revise our plan...
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content: Hoho, Mors, please stay and take good care of these specimens that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> has painstakingly collected.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
Each to their own expertise.
When it comes to collecting materials,
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> is clearly the most efficient choice.
info: 捐赠开馆素材-墨尔斯_主流程文本2

content:
...Oh~!
I just saw that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> arrived,
Mors and I were discussing the construction plans for the Omni-Gallery.
